subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Mets scored an easy victory over the Phillies, aided by catcher Travis d’Arnaud’s three-run homer and another strong performance by starter Bartolo Colon.
snippet: The Mets scored an easy victory over the Phillies, aided by catcher Travis d’Arnaud’s three-run homer and another strong performance by starter Bartolo Colon.
